# loading the package

ggplot2 is a package fore creating professional-quality graphs. Once the package is installed, load the package using

```{r, eval=FALSE, include=TRUE}
library(ggplot2)
```

or

```{r, eval=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=TRUE}
require(ggplot2)
```
